The following setup will get you started with Eclipse in web development.

= Server and IDE setup =
  # Download latest Maven2 and unpack it under `/opt/maven`
  # Download latest Tomcat Server (just the zip version) and unpack it under `/opt/tomcat`
  # Download lastest Eclipse and unpack it under `/opt/eclipse`
  # Open Eclipse and install M2Ecilpse plugin
  # Open Eclipse and Setup ServerRuntime that points to /opt/tomcat

= Project Setup =
  # Generate a maven project using Toolbox from this project
  # Open Eclipse, Import a Maven Project, point to your project root directory
  # Add your project to your ServerRuntime, and starts it.
